original_text:
As they wail and mourn over you,
    they will take up a lament concerning you:
“Who was ever silenced like Tyre,
    surrounded by the sea?”
korean_text: 그들이 통곡할 때에 너를 위하여 슬픈 노래를 불러 애도하여 말하기를 두로와 같이 바다 가운데에서 적막한 자 누구인고

sentences.original_text: As they wail and mourn over you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너를 위해 애곡하고 슬퍼할 때에,

sentences.original_text: they will take up a lament concerning you:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너에 대한 슬픔의 노래를 부를 것이라:

sentences.original_text: Who was ever silenced like Tyre,
